channel.title: Cant seem to get my server on
channel.description: well when i click run.bat for mopar then i go my source pimpscape and i can log in with local host 127.0.0.1 but i went to the no-ip site and registerd made a name and i try to add it to moparscape server page and it says u cannot register a offline server does anywon know how to get it on and yes i did go on mod thaork tut i cant find the gamer thing on my router site

item.title: Cant seem to get my server on
item.dc:creator: @skaterboy skaterboy
item.description:
@skaterboy wrote:

the beanie whats ur msn i need ask u somtin[br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2007, 08:59:43 PM[/size][hr]whats all the places im suppose to put my server name in? b/c i dont get it when i dont click runserver.bat i cant go on local host when i click runserver.bat i can get on but then if i enter the server name cannot connect[br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2007, 11:05:39 PM[/size][hr]somewon plz help

Read full topic
item.source: Cant seem to get my server on

item.title: Cant seem to get my server on
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

what is your router? because i used to have the same problem. it has to do with your anti virus. (if this is the case) because for me when i ran my first server, norton anti virus, blocked people from entering my server. it blocked out port 2224 Tcp connection. so noone could log in. if this is the case, you would just go to NAv and click on options, click on the sub-catergory, internet worm protection and uncheck the box and put for “until system restarts” and that should fix your problem, if thats the case. if it isn’t and you have another anti virus just boot up your computer wthout the anti virus running by using Start>Run>type in “msconfig” without quotations. if you could specify the router i could help you out more…sorry.

TheBeanie:

Look for something about DMZ. That Opens all ports at once, And is what i use.

wouldn’t you like totally get owned by worms -.-. you know some ports are like there just for trojans, worms, etc to go in. because once you log onto Msn Messenger, boom boom good bye. ( thats why i hate msn messenger…)

Read full topic

item.title: Cant seem to get my server on
item.dc:creator: @cocoa7 cocoa7
item.description:
@cocoa7 wrote:

yes hes right port forward but scince u can log into ur server off of 127.0.0.1 then u can check off downloading jdk from ur list of problems. if port forwarding dosent work also check your firewall and have it so it allows the port # which 43594 is default but use which ever port u used.
